title: Conduct a Water Ingress Test
description: After an aircraft is fully assembled, it must be tested to ensure the fuselage, windows, and doors are properly sealed against rain.

tasks.description: Position the aircraft in a water test booth.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent moves the aircraft into the test facility.

tasks.description: Spray the aircraft with water at specified pressures and angles to simulate heavy rain.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent operates the water spray system according to the test procedure.

tasks.description: Inspect the interior of the aircraft for any signs of water leaks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a thorough internal inspection and finds no leaks.
